channel.title: My R Blog
channel.description: Recent content on My R Blog

item.title: Using R Markdown for recurring Reports
R Markdown for Novices
item.description: I strongly encourage every researcher and every analyst to use it, because R Markdown will make your life easier: Easily share your result: R Markdown can convert your results to various formats such as html, word and pdf. No more copy pasting and everything is up to date! Quickly explore your data: You use R Markdown like a Notebook and see can see multiple Outputs and plots without having to use the RStudio Viewer back buttons.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
